author: courant.com
title: Pictures: Glastonbury Apple Harvest Festival
text: Caption Glastonbury Apple Harvest Festival Nick Caito, Special to the Courant Nick Caito, Special to the Courant Glastonbury Apple Harvest Festival Nick Caito, Special to the Courant Nick Caito, Special to the Courant See more galleries The annual Glastonbury Apple Harvest Festival at Riverfront Park ran from Oct. 16-18 and featured live music, foods and a 5K race on Sunday.
